entry.title: Trupti-coder/newsApp-Project: A modern, responsive web application built with React that delivers the latest news from various categories in real-time. This app fetches news data from an external API and presents it in an engaging and user-friendly interface. It is designed to be fast, lightweight, and accessible across all devices.
entry.content: A modern, responsive web application built with React that delivers the latest news from various categories in real-time. This app fetches news data from an external API and presents it in an engaging and user-friendly interface. It is designed to be fast, lightweight, and accessible across all devices.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: Justmide/Real-time-Chat-Frontend: A real-time chat frontend built with Vite, React, and Socket.io for instant messaging. It enables seamless WebSocket-based communication, message broadcasting, and a responsive UI. Fast, lightweight, and optimized for real-time interactions. Hashtags: #React #Vite #SocketIO #ChatApp #RealTime #WebSockets #Frontend
